# Uploading Background Images

In order to use the body diagram feature you must first upload at least one background image to draw on. You can upload any image you would like and usually a google image search will contain many results that you may be looking for.

# To upload an image

  • Navigate to the Templates page of the application.
  • At the top of the page you will see the Body Diagrams section in the image above.
  • Click the "choose a file" button and select an image to upload
  • Click "Upload" button to upload the file.
  • You should now see a thumbnail image of the file you just uploaded in the list of backgrounds for your office.
